name: Sector (itch) (studiokaboom)
description:
Sector is a single player horror survival game where you have awoken locked up in a cell in what looks to be a scientific facility however you can’t see anyone, and it looks to be heavily damaged with no power. You need to find your way out but as you will soon see you are not alone in the building.

 

Features

  • Single player
  • No internet required
  • Mouse and keyboard support
